name: Mediterranean Chickpea Salad
author: OpenAI

img.description: A vibrant and fresh Mediterranean Chickpea Salad.

reviews.txt: A refreshing and hearty salad, perfect for any meal!
Packed with flavors and so easy to make. Loved it!
A wonderful combination of fresh ingredients. My family enjoyed it.
Healthy and delicious. A great addition to my meal prep!

recipe: Prepare the Vegetables: In a large bowl, combine the diced cucumber, halved cherry tomatoes, thinly sliced red onion, and sliced kalamata olives.
Add the Chickpeas: Add the drained and rinsed chickpeas to the bowl with the vegetables.
Add the Cheese: Sprinkle the crumbled feta cheese over the salad.
Mix the Dressing: In a small bowl, whisk together the extra virgin olive oil, lemon juice, dried oregano, salt, and black pepper.
Toss the Salad: Pour the dressing over the salad and toss gently to combine all ingredients.
Serve: Garnish with chopped fresh parsley before serving. Enjoy!
